playerList.name: gbc - Pizza Boy Basic
playerList.description: Supported extensions: gb, gbc, gbs, zip, 7z.
playerList.amStartArguments:
-n it.dbtecno.pizzaboy/it.dbtecno.pizzaboy.MainActivity
  -e rom_uri {file.path}
  --activity-clear-task
  --activity-clear-top

playerList.name: gbc - com.explusalpha.GbcEmu
playerList.description: Support extensions: bin, cgb, dmg, gb, gbc, gbs, rom, sgb.
playerList.amStartArguments:
-n com.explusalpha.GbcEmu/com.imagine.BaseActivity
  -a android.intent.action.VIEW
  -d "{file.uri}"

playerList.name: gbc - RetroArch 64 - gambatte
playerList.description: Supported extensions: dmg, gb, gbc, zip, 7z.
playerList.amStartArguments:
-n com.retroarch.aarch64/com.retroarch.browser.retroactivity.RetroActivityFuture
  -e ROM {file.path}
  -e LIBRETRO /data/data/com.retroarch.aarch64/cores/gambatte_libretro_android.so
  -e CONFIGFILE /storage/emulated/0/Android/data/com.retroarch.aarch64/files/retroarch.cfg
  -e IME com.android.inputmethod.latin/.LatinIME
  -e DATADIR /data/data/com.retroarch.aarch64
  -e APK /data/app/com.retroarch.aarch64-1/base.apk
  -e SDCARD /storage/emulated/0
  -e EXTERNAL /storage/emulated/0/Android/data/com.retroarch.aarch64/files
  --activity-clear-task
  --activity-clear-top
